   sphinx-quickstart on Sun Dec 22 13:11:01 2019.
   You can adapt this file completely to your liking, but it should at least
   contain the root `toctree` directive.

MutAnno
=======
**MutAnno** is a python toolkit providing variant annotations based on a command line interface.


.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/mutanno.svg
   :target: https://pypi.org/project/mutanno/
   :alt: Latest PyPI version

.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/dm/mutanno.svg
   :target: https://pypi.org/project/mutanno/
   :alt: Number of PyPI downloads

.. image:: https://readthedocs.org/projects/mutanno/badge/?version=latest
   :target: https://mutanno.readthedocs.io/en/latest/
   :alt: Documentation of MutAnno


.. code-block:: console

   pip install mutanno 
   mutanno annot -vcf test.vcf
